remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要为某个单元定义 ，请指定 的 。To define a for a cell, specify a of . 可以对表、列或单元格级别的单元应用 。A can be applied to a cell at the table, column, or cell level. 若要将 应用于列中的所有单元，请设置 属性，该属性优先于 属性。To apply a to all cells in a column, set the property, which takes precedence over the property. 若要将 应用于单个单元，请直接在 对象上设置 属性，这优先于应用于该单元格的所有其他样式。To apply a to an individual cell, set the property directly on the object, which takes precedence over all other styles that you apply to the cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置该列相对于 中其他列的显示位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the display position of the column relative to the other columns in the .

value.span: 当列显示在关联的 中时，该列从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column, as it is displayed in the associated .

value.span: 注册的默认值为-1。

span.span: The registered default is -1.

value.span: 有关可能影响该值的因素的信息，请参见 。

span.span: For information about what can influence the value, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将 属性添加到 集合之前，该属性的默认值为-1。The property has a default value of -1 before it is added to the collection. 在将列添加到 时，此值将更新。This value is updated when the column is added to the . 要求每个列的 属性必须是从0到 的唯一整数。The requires that the property of each column must be a unique integer from 0 to the of -1. 因此，当某一列的 更改时，更改通常会导致其他列的 也发生更改。Therefore, when the of one column changes, the change typically causes the of other columns to also change. 机制强制实施对 值的限制。The restrictions on the value are enforced by a mechanism. 如果尝试设置无效的值，则会引发运行时异常。If you attempt to set a value that is not valid, a run-time exception is thrown. 更改 属性的值时，将引发 事件。When the value of the property is changed, the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可设置 中单个列的 。Use this property to set the for an individual column in the . 若要为拖动指示器定义 ，请指定 的 。To define a for the drag indicator, specify a of . 您可以设置样式中的属性，以更改拖动指示器的某些元素（如列标题周围的边框）的外观。You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header. 但是，拖动指示器的默认模板使用 绘制 ，其中包含正在拖动的原始列标题的图像。However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a to paint a with an image of the original column header that is being dragged. 因此，如果您在样式中设置了某些属性（如 或 ），则它们将不会应用。As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as or , they will appear to not be applied. 若要在拖动列标题时更改其外观，请应用不使用默认 的新模板。To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能用于冻结列。 cannot be used to freeze a column. 相反，请设置 属性。Instead, set the property. 由 数字指定的列最左侧的列将就地冻结。The leftmost columns up to the column that is specified by the number will freeze in place. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在从 中选择 "冻结列" 时冻结列。The following example shows how to freeze a column when "Freeze Column" is selected from the . 列将向左移动，以便包含在冻结列中。Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/cs/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_FrozenColumn#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_frozencolumn/vb/window1.xaml.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `true`，以使单个列中的所有单元格成为只读的。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only. 将 属性设置为 `true`，以使 中的所有单元格为只读。Set the property to `true` to make all cells in the read-only. 将 属性设置为 `true` 以使单个单元格为只读。Set the property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only. 如果 、列或单元格级别的设置之间存在冲突，则 `true` 的值优先于 `false`的值。If a conflict exists between the settings at the , column, or cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个选定的单元格，将调用此方法来检索默认单元格内容。This method is called for each selected cell to retrieve the default cell content. 然后，它引发 事件。It then raises the event. 可以处理事件，以便在返回单元格内容之前对其进行修改。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为 提供了自定义粘贴实现，则此方法可用作帮助程序。This method can be used as a helper if you provide a custom paste implementation for the . 单元格内容存储在 `item` 对象中。The cell content is stored in the `item` object. 此方法引发 事件。This method raises the event. 可以处理事件，以便在将单元格粘贴到单元格中之前修改单元格内容。You can handle the event to modify the cell content before it is pasted into the cell. 可以将 `cellContent` 设置为 `null` 以取消粘贴操作。You can set `cellContent` to `null` to cancel the paste action.

span.span: Occurs before the clipboard content is moved to the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序可以在将剪贴板内容存储到单元内容之前对其进行修改。Event handlers can modify the clipboard content before it gets stored in the cell content.
